notes.text: We now provide an option to merge the control title and section title for custom sections
We now provide a building block for the tree table
We have improved the suggestions for recently entered values
We now correctly encode URL parameters when navigating away from the quickview popover
You can now use the manifest to customize the export settings of a column
The filter bar now works properly with custom filter fields in multi-view mode
We now provide support for consuming design time cards in SAP Collaboration Manager
Now we get the correct label from annotations for the filter fields where manifest settings are passed without the label property.
You can now use the Share as Card option to share the design time cards created by the card generator, if the cards are provided for an object page
You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form
In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly recreate the empty row after deleting it in a table
You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form
We now support the @Common.ExternalID annotation for fields that have a technical ID as the key
We’ve resolved an issue related to a redundant error message popup
We now support navigation properties also on the nonFilterableProperties list of filter restrictions
We now correctly manage the exceptions from the shell navigation service while fetching the list of semantic objects from the intents the current user can navigate to
We now show a generic message for actions that fail with strict handling
The contact card now shows the contact's availability from Microsoft Teams
We now ensure that only the 'Delete' action is available in the context menu for an empty row
We now ensure that the message popover for tables displays the column name that’s associated to the error
We now support side effects events triggered by the application server
You can now use the list report extension API to programmatically update view content and refresh its count
Field templating: The relative path is now correctly considered in the binding of editable, required, enabled, and editMode
We’ve harmonized the naming of custom filters in the flexible programming model explorer
We now correctly manage the page ID parameter in the changePageConfiguration extension point to apply configuration changes that can also be used as a feature toggle
Applications can now dynamically display the ‘Summarize’ button if the prerequisites are fulfilled
We now ensure that the Discard Draft popup works correctly when navigating away from a subobject page
We now ensure that the criticality remains correct after the creation of a new entity, by ensuring the update event is always triggered
You can now correctly navigate between newly created items in sticky mode
We now correctly evaluate the complex expression for the FieldControl annotations
We now ensure that fields with currencies based on an integer value work correctly in edit mode
We now ensure that side effects are applied on radio buttons
We now ensure that the navigate function in the routing controller extension supports the preserveHistory parameter
We now show all the information messages that are sent as part of the back-end response for an action
We now ensure that columns with a defined scale are exported correctly
We now ensure that side effects work correctly when the manifest setting for the object page uses a contextPath parameter
The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
The paste feature with hidden properties used as the description now works correctly
Custom filters now work correctly in the FilterBar building block
We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
Custom filters now work correctly without a context path
We've resolved an issue within the flexible column layout that occurs when Edit is clicked for non-draft entities on the right panel
We no longer show the subsections that are dynamically invisible on the anchor bar of the object page
